}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[https://electric.garden/zyxel-communications-i88 FCC ID]: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/I88NBG7815/ I88NBG7815] (2020-04-07) :OEM: [[Delta Networks]] (PCB: 2976958602) <!--There is unpopulated circuitry on the board for an additional 2.5GbE ethernet jack.-->
===Specifications=== *CPU: Quad-core ARM @2.2GHz (64-bit) *Memory: 4GB Flash/1GB RAM *Wireless Speed: AX6000 (1200 + 4800Mbps) :2.4GHz AX: 4x4, 1024QAM, 20/40 MHz, 1.2Gbps :5GHz AX: 8x8, 1024QAM, 20/40/80 MHz, 4.8Gbps :Compatible with 802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi standards *WAN: 1x 1/2.5 GbE port *LAN: 1x 1/2.5/5/10 GbE port, :4x 10/100/1000 Mbps ports *USB: 1x USB 3.1 (Gen 2) port *Antenna: 13x int. antennas *Power rating: 19V/2.1A :Power consumption: 39W max
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== :;[[ZyXEL]] • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/home-home_routers.shtml Home Routers] *[[ZyXEL WAP6806 (Armor X1)]] - AC2100 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Access Point :• FCC ID: I88WAP6806 (2016-05-31) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2100-Dual-Band-Wireless-Gigabit-Access-Point-Range-Extender-ARMOR-X1/ PPage] (Access Point/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6906 (Armor X2)]] - AC3800 Tri-Band WiFi Repeater/Range Extender :• FCC ID: I88WAP6906 (2018-03-14) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2600-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-Router-ARMOR-G1/ PPage] *[[ZyXEL NBG6815]] ([https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2200-MU-MIMO-Dual-Band-Wireless-Gigabit-Router-NBG6815/ Armor Y?]) - AC2200 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6815 (2015-11-30) *[[ZyXEL NBG6816 (Armor Z1)]] - AC2350 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6816 (2015-06-26) *[[ZyXEL NBG6817 (Armor Z2)]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6817 (2016-09-14) *[[ZyXEL NBG6818 (Armor G1)]] - AC2600 Multi-Gigabit Security WiFi Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6818 (2020-01-10) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2600-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-Router-ARMOR-G1/ PPage] *[[ZyXEL NBG7510]] - AX1800 WiFi 6 Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG7510 (2022-04-15) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AX1800-WiFi-6-Gigabit-Router-NBG7510/ PPage] • *[[ZyXEL NBG7815 (Armor G5)]] - AX6000 12-Stream Multi-Gigabit WiFi 6 Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG7815 (2020-04-07) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AX6000-12-Stream-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-6-Router-ARMOR-G5// PPage] • [https://www.amazon.com/Zyxel-Armor-12-Stream-Multi-Gigabit-Router/dp/B08K3GCBJM Amazon]
